fieldDefinitions.name: notificationUrl
fieldDefinitions.description: What is your notification web address for us to send push notifications to?
fieldDefinitions.hint: You must only give us a web address that you own. Your application will use this address to listen to notifications from HMRC.

validation.errorMessage: notificationUrl must be a valid https URL

fieldDefinitions.hint: This will be a piece of text for example Bearer cn389ncoiwuencr
